response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price tailored for valued individuals like yourself. Considering its immense worth and the value it holds for you, we propose to make this remarkable opportunity available to you for $11,000. This is a special offer that reflects both the quality of the product and your appreciation for its benefits. We believe this price offers a great balance between value and affordability, ensuring you receive the best possible experience with our product. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
